extensionDescription.message: Brings back the 'View Image' and 'Search by Image' options in google image search results, as well as adding copy and download options.

ViewImage.description: View Image button on image results.

copyImage.description: Copy image button on image results (dropdown)

downloadImage.description: Download image button on image results (dropdown)

settings.description: Text in settings button, if in dropdown.

allSizes.description: All Sizes link on image pages

searchByImage.description: Search by Image link on image pages

copyFailed.description: Title of copy failure error popup.

copyFailedMsg.message:
Copying $TYPE$ images is not supported. 
Download or use the right click context menu.
copyFailedMsg.description: Informs the user that the image type is unsupported for copying.

viewImageSetting.description: View Image button on settings menu.

copyImageSetting.description: Copy image button on settings menu.

downloadImageSetting.description: Download image button on settings menu.

settingBtnPlacement.description: Settings button placement option header (settings page)

settingBtnSeperate.description: Default option for settings button placement (settings).

settingBtnDropdown.description: In dropdown option for settings button placement (settings).

settingAdvNewTab.description: Settings option for opening in new tabs.

settingAdvHideShare.description: Settings option for hiding google's default 'Share' button.
